title: Stress tests for the RAR task: collect data set.
body:
We would like to implement and perform stress tests for the RAR task in order to identify possible issues with concurrency. This issue is part of the RAR as a service user story: #3139.

This issue concerns the collection of data set for stress testing. 

- [ ] define input and verification format
- [ ] build projects to get test data: "dotnet new -l" list, OC, MSBuild, Roslyn, UWP, a VB.NET project, etc
- [ ] run input data through RAR & attain verification state
- [ ] configure data set in the defined format
- [ ] deduplicate the test data if needed
